Talk034:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughL_01>Only the most impressive fashionista in
Hyrule's trendiest village is worthy of
such a crown!
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:SagonoCheck_00>What an...interesting ensemble. <sp:5:0:0>I can't
deny it's original, and yet...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>You're neglecting the critical importance
of coordination. <sp:5:1:0>And so, alas...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SagonoCheck_02>A mere 50 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk035:
<sp:3:0:2:0901>Maybe you don't realize, but plants need
their sleep too.<sp:0:4:0>Those eyesores are so bright at night that
they're keeping the veggies awake! It's a
real problem for the crops!
Talk036:
<sp:3:0:2:0901>Hateno's foundation is its produce!
What are we going to do if it fails?!
Talk037:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Who do you suppose you have to thank
for Hateno's rejuvenation?
Talk038:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>My avant-garde approach versus this
mayor's quaint, bygone ways!
Talk039:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The citizens will decide which outlook
will drive the future of the village.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So, then. Are you interested in perusing
my collection of exquisite wares?
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>If you've taken a liking to anything in my
collection, I'd make an exception for you
and sell it.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>Ah. <sp:5:0:0>While that is a dashing hood, it might
be better to show your face here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>If you like, I could give your outfit that
personal Cece touch.
Talk_90: <sp:3:0:2:0000>That, hmm? How many are you selling?
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>Ah. <sp:5:0:0>That's such a dashing hood that it
seems a shame not to wear it up.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>If you like, I could give your outfit that
personal Cece touch.
Talk040: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Sure. Suits me. <sp:5:0:0>I'll win that pretty easy.
Talk_24: <sp:3:0:2:0800>You see? My opinion is never wrong!
Talk041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ah...look who's here. <sp:5:0:0>What can I do for
you, O esteemed <clr:0000>Mayor Reede<clr:ffff>?
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>No, you say? <sp:5:0:0>Well...<sp:5:0:0>the first rule of
fashion is to do whatever you think best.
Talk_94:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SagonoCheck_00>Oh! The bold elegance of walking in here
wearing such unequaled fashion! <sp:5:1:0>Such
perfect confidence! Such refined taste!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>A full 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>You can walk the streets or the runways
with pride, wearing the very finest and
most limited-edition Cece-brand couture!
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Your pouch is stuffed. Come back when
you've jettisoned all that unnecessary
bric-a-brac.
Talk043: <sp:3:0:2:0800>My Cece hat is a work of art!
Talk_95:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Oho! I'd quite forgotten that we seem to
be out of rare pieces for sale.
Talk044:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Do you see that luxurious curve? Do you
note my avant-garde color choices?
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>I did mention, yes, that the merchandise I
curate is only the rarest of fine clothing?<sp:0:4:0>Meaning it's not always easy to come by.
Talk045:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Wouldn't you call it the pinnacle
of perfection?
Talk_97:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Aaah. It shows great personal growth that
you can recognize the quality of my most
uniquely luxurious design.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>However, this piece is so special that
I would go so far as to call it priceless.
It's not for sale!<sp:0:4:0>The only way I would part with it is to find
<clr:0000>someone meeting my personal approval<clr:ffff>
that I could pass it on to.
Talk_98:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, you mean the clothes this shop used
to sell?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>What was it, the <clr:0000>royal guard<clr:ffff> and...
the <clr:0000>Hylian series<clr:ffff>, yes?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>I disposed of all that.<sp:0:4:0>There's no need for this shop to stock
anything that doesn't meet my exacting
standard for fashion.<sp:0:4:0>Unless and until I change my mind again,
this shop is now the flagship location for
the Cece brand!
Talk_99:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Be on your way, then. And please...
pay the slightest bit of consideration
to fashion.<sp:0:4:0>At least make <clr:0000>the color<clr:ffff> your own.
Try consulting with Sayge at the
<clr:0000>Kochi Dye Shop<clr:ffff>.
Talk048:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Window shopping is encouraged,<sp:5:0:0> but we
have a strict hands-off policy when it
comes to our displays.<sp:0:4:0>My sister would insist if she was here.
Where has she gone now?
Talk_30:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease>That's a relief. Oh, how I hate to part with anything
in my precious collection of rarities!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>My collection of rarities... The one I have
so painstakingly curated... It's completely
emptied out!<sp:0:4:0>But no matter. I'll replenish it one way
or another.
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Fashion is a mirror that reflects our inner
selves. Be bold and express yours as you
continue your quest!
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Ah, well, you see... <sp:5:0:0>My apologies, but this
isn't the sort of place that deals in that
kind of thing.
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>If you can't even take it off, I have doubts
regarding your sincerity in wanting to get
rid of it.<sp:0:4:0>Return to me once you've managed to
extricate yourself from the garment.
Talk_100:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Before you go, I will concede that you're
starting to pay the barest minimum of
attention to fashion.<sp:0:4:0>Is that Sayge's hand I detect in your
outfit? I can always tell when someone
has visited the <clr:0000>Kochi Dye Shop<clr:ffff>.
Talk_101:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Be on your way, then.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0900>And put some clothes on as you go!<sp:0:4:0>To strut around bare isn't merely a public
nuisance, it's a crime against fashion!
Talk_102:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Only you have the nerve to address the
great Cece so casually.<sp:0:4:0>Do you need something?
Talk_103:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I have a private <clr:0000>collection of rarities <clr:ffff>from
antiquity, sourced from all over the world!<sp:0:4:0>Items from my collection aren't ordinarily
up for sale, but...I'd make an exception
for you.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>If you ever part ways with an article of
clothing that's hard to come by<clr:ffff>, see me.
I may have just the thing you're missing.
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'll return it to its place in the display case
later, I suppose. Have you anything else?
Talk_104:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>With you getting out my vote, I'm certain
those Reede partisans will see the light!<sp:0:4:0>Excellent work, darling. Be assured that
I shan't forget all you've done.<sp:0:4:0>Once the election begins in earnest,
I hope you'll be on hand to witness my
triumphant ascendence to public office!
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Ah, more's the pity. Have you anything
else to sell instead?
Talk_105:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I have a private <clr:0000>collection of rarities <clr:ffff>from
all over the world. They were designed by
the finest artistes of generations past!<sp:0:4:0>Everything in it is so <clr:0000>rare <clr:ffff>that you won't
find them in any other shop. But for you,
I'd be happy to talk terms.
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Goodness. <sp:5:1:0>Make no mistake, that set me
on the back foot. Have you anything else?
Talk_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Gracious! <sp:5:0:0>Why aren't you wearing
anything?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0901>Is this your idea of fashion?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:SagonoCheck_00>Then again, from a certain perspective,
that lean, disciplined physical form has
a certain undeniable aesthetic.<sp:0:4:0>Perhaps it's a new kind of fashion—one
that's far ahead of its time. Until that time
comes, however...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SagonoCheck_01>Zero points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_106:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>More should be arriving shortly, rest
assured. Until then, would you like to
see inside anyway?
Talk_107: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Have you anything else to sell instead?
Talk_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS>What an outfit! <sp:5:0:0>It's as though you've been
possessed by an <clr:0000>ancient hero's aspect<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>I'm struck by its balance of eeriness and
dignity. <sp:5:1:0>Surely, its resolute presence in
the face of evil is worth...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>a full 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>Ah, I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>awakening <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>It's deceptively hard to make such a cute
look into fashion. For that significant feat,
I award you...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>a full 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Ah, I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>charged <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>There's much to be gained from dressing
in those sparkling, volatile clothes. <sp:5:1:0>The
powers of the storm, as well as...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>a full 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that outfit. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>ember <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>This is the aesthetic of the great fire that
will one day consume the world!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>100 burning, screaming points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Ah, I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>frostbite <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Even under those layers, the heart's fire
burns through. Though I do appreciate
the frosty facade.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>An ice-cold 100 points to you!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_51:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Ah, I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>climbing <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>It's made of lightweight fabrics, but to
climb sheer cliffs shouldn't be taken
lightly. <sp:5:1:0>Nevertheless, a delightful outfit!
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>An elevated 100 points for you!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_52:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Ah, I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>dark <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>The expressionless face suits the
monochromatic outfit. <sp:5:1:0>That stoic look<sp:5:0:0>
is very in right now.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>The full 100 points, naturally!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Ahhh. <sp:5:0:0>Another practically <sp:5:0:0>perfect<sp:5:0:0>
masterpiece. <sp:5:0:0>It's an exemplar of the
form from every angle.
Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>glide <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>That birdlike design is so surprising and
fun! <sp:5:0:0>Not only that, the whole ensemble is
functional and nicely ventilated.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>A soaring 100 points are yours!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Oh, pardon me. Are you an admirer here
to meet the incomparable <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff>?
Talk003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Welcome to <clr:0000>Ventest Clothing<clr:ffff>, the only
boutique in the world which carries the
Cece brand. And if you weren't aware...
Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>desert voe <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Coverage versus exposure is always a
tricky question. <sp:5:0:0>But there's no covering
up your passion, for which I award...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>the full 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>The <clr:0000>Cece hat<clr:ffff>, the newest and most
magnificent work by yours truly, <sp:5:0:0>Cece!
Talk005:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>What's all this about "Hyrule's trendiest
village"?! I don't remember approving any
new slogans for Hateno!
Talk_57:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>flamebreaker <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>I appreciate the juxtaposition of the hard
metal with the careful matte finish. <sp:5:1:0>Does it
insulate you from a smoldering gaze?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>You earn a heated 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk006:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Cece! You have got to quit littering the
village with your weird art pieces!
Talk_58:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>Hylian <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Are you the sort who wears the hood up
or lets the whole world see your face?<sp:5:1:0>
For the trick of two styles in one...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>two 100s, for 200 total points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk007:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease_00>Now, now, dear. <sp:5:0:0>There's no need to get
so worked up. I think some of the people
here actually like her art, you know.<sp:0:4:0>Wouldn't it be better to hear her out?
Talk_59:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>Fierce Deity <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Its mysterious allure is just exquisite.<sp:5:1:0>
Even the strictest of scorers would be
forced to award you...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>the full 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk008:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Painful_00>Don't fall for her line of twaddle! She's
got everyone in Hateno wrapped around
her finger already!<sp:0:4:0>My duty is to look after the village, and
that's what I mean to do.
Talk_60:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>wild <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Not only is it a visual feast, it's a treat
for the nose as well. <sp:5:1:0>The smell wafting
from that ensemble takes me back...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>An aromatic 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_61:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>miner's <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Your taste in fashion truly shines through
in these clothes. <sp:5:1:0>You have a bright future
in fashion, I'd say!<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>A full 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_01>Do they? Then let us leave the matter to
the people to decide!
Talk_62:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>mystic <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>It feels like it's summoning a cool, pure
breeze from nowhere. <sp:5:1:0>And yet, it remains
a sterling example of high fashion!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>A sacred 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_63:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>radiant <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>It's most easily appreciated when worn in
the dark. <sp:5:1:0>Yet there's a certain appeal to
seeing it in full display during the day...<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>One hundred shimmering points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk012:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>I'm really sorry! <sp:5:0:0>I tried to stop him from
coming in like you asked, but he wouldn't
take no for an answer.
Talk_64:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>froggy <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>I have a soft spot for idiosyncratically
cute designs. And this strange-looking
frog costume definitely fits the bill.<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>Anyone would give it 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Sophie! I delegate management of the
<clr:0000>mayoral election <clr:ffff>to you.
Talk_65:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>time <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>What I love most about that shirt is that
whether it's worn by a child or an adult,
its fashion statement is timeless.<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>It gets a unanimous 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_66:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>phantom <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>"If you want to exude confidence, start
with glowing eyes." <sp:5:1:0>Is that an expression?
Well, it should be.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>A mesmerizing full 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_67:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>evil spirit <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>That ensemble is so vibrant that it's like
it leapt out of a painting. And part of me
wishes it would leap back in.<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>Still, a full 100 points are yours!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_68:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>barbarian <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Gracious me and mine. That's one rough-
and-tumble look you've assembled.<sp:5:1:0> Could
you possibly be any more feral?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>A full 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_69:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>snowquill <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>The Rito feathers look soft, delicate, and
comfortably warm. Why, they've even
thawed my heart.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>A balmy 100 points to you!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk019:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This piece is so special that I dare not
assign a price to it. It's not for sale!
Talk_70:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>royal guard <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>It's quite a sight to see the old castle
uniform get trotted out again. <sp:5:1:0>Almost
brings a tear to my eye.<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>An unapologetic 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_71:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>rubber <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Can you...<sp:5:0:0>see out of that mask? <sp:5:1:0>Well, if
you can't, I'm all the more impressed at
your commitment to the aesthetic.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>A full 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk020: <sp:3:0:2:0701>As proof, I present to you this...
Talk_72:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>stealth <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Among those in the know, the mask
covering your mouth is a sign of the sort
of wisdom that keeps its own counsel.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>No less than 100 points will do!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_73:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>sky <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Green suits you, no? <sp:5:1:0>Fashion scholars
believe that outfit marks an important
milestone in one's development.<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>True or not, you get 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_74:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>Tingle <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>It's a fetching outfit, yet I feel it's missing
something. <sp:5:1:0>A balloon or two, perhaps?<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>Regardless, 100 points are yours!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk023:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>It didn't need rejuvenating! Hateno Village
is a peaceful place where folks live quiet
lives, and that's the way they like it!
Talk_75:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>twilight <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>What's that smell? <sp:5:0:0>I detect a bit of a
bestial musk. <sp:5:1:0>And is that an ambiguously
sinister aroma from the outfit's back?
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>No more questions—100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_76:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>Depths <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Most people who say they're clad in
darkness don't mean it so literally.<sp:5:1:0> I'd
love to know how you pulled it off.<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>Take an enigmatic 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_77:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>wind <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>You're really selling me on the shading
of that outfit. I can practically smell the
salty sea breeze now.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>That's a flat 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk026:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Painful_00>Come on, Clavia. I don't feel like sticking
around here any longer. It's time we
headed back <clr:0000>home<clr:ffff>!
Talk_78:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>Yiga <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>A woman of my discernment can easily
tell the difference between genuine and
faux evil, for the record. Therefore...<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>100 points! No arguments!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_79:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>hero <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>It's deceptively difficult to make such an
ensemble pop. <sp:5:1:0>The hat's accent color is
doing a lot of work here.<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>The full 100 points, naturally!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk028:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This is the sort of thing on which I've
built my name and reputation as the
<clr:0000>world-renowned Cece<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>Hmm?
Talk029:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hmm. <sp:5:1:0>I must say, you don't seem to show
any sort of interest in fashion.
Talk_80:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>zonaite <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>What a striking design! <sp:5:1:0>It's brimming over
with vitality and élan.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>A full 100 points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_81:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>Zora <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Those fins and tail fluttering in the wind...
You strike me as a beached mermaid.<sp:0:4:0>Or should I say, a merman!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>One hundred waterlogged points!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk030:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>You stand before the very woman who
changed this fusty old village into the
birthplace of nouveau fashion!
Talk_82:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700><sp:0:2:2:6400>No. One mustn't go back on one's word.
Now then, choose whatever piece you've
taken a liking to.
Talk031:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01><sp:1:3:4:b4000000>Do you see that luxurious curve? Do you
note my avant-garde color choices?
Talk_83:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>I recognize that apparel. <sp:5:0:0>It's from the
<clr:0000>soldier's <clr:ffff>line.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>And you've put together a complete set!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Normally, wearing work clothes casually is
a fashion don't. <sp:5:1:0>But this is certainly one
way to show that you mean business!<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SagonoCheck_03>Have a full 100 points, soldier!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk032:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><sp:1:3:4:78000000>Wouldn't you call it the pinnacle
of perfection?
Talk_84:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Think>I don't know which of us is going to win
the election, <sp:5:0:0>but I do know it won't
be Reede.
Talk033:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I shall only part with it when I find
someone <clr:0000>truly worthy of owning it<clr:ffff>.
Talk_17: <sp:3:0:2:0700>For you, only the warmest of welcomes!
